description: This task involves writing out a step-by-step installation guide which will help developers using Fedora to install Mifos X for further contribution. This will require the student to have access to a computer running Fedora. Notify GCI Mentors That You've Completed Task when you submit your write-up in a document here ( https://goo.gl/TuN7Bj ).
name: Write Mifos X Installation Guide For Developers Using Fedora
